docs.text:
License: MIT

Calculate (Finnish: laskea) some parts..

Third party dependencies are documented in the folder third-party.
docs.title: laskea

docs.text:
• Documented usage examples (for now primarily shenannigans)
  • Added update, verify, and version CLI interfaces
  • Automated SBOM creation and dependency information retrieval
  • Added parent commit information to version info
  • Generated JQL listener and visitor APIs from ANTLR4 grammar

Preferred way to install is as usual (for testing or in isolation):

$ pipx install laskea

For production use (well, ahem, ...) or within a virtual python env:

$ pip install laskea
docs.title: Installation

docs.text:
$ laskea
Usage: laskea [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]...

  Calculate (Finnish: laskea) some parts.

Options:
  -V, --version  Display the laskea version and exit
  -h, --help     Show this message and exit.

Commands:
  update   Fill in some parts of the input document.
  verify   Answer the question if the input document is in good shape.
  version  Display the laskea version and exit.
docs.title: Help

docs.text:
$ laskea update tests/fixtures/basic/empty.md
using configuration ({})
Would act on command ='update', inp ='tests/fixtures/basic/empty.md', and config ='/Users/ruth/.laskea.json'
NotImplemented (yet)
docs.title: Update

docs.text:
$ laskea update -h
Usage: laskea update [OPTIONS] [SOURCE]

  Fill in some parts of the input document.

Arguments:
  [SOURCE]  [default: ]

Options:
  -i, --input <sourcepath>   Path to input file
  -c, --config <configpath>  Path to config file (default is
                             $HOME/.laskea.json)
  -h, --help                 Show this message and exit.
docs.title: Help

docs.text:
$ laskea verify tests/fixtures/basic/empty.md
using configuration ({})
Would act on command ='verify', inp ='tests/fixtures/basic/empty.md', and config ='/Users/ruth/.laskea.json'
NotImplemented (yet)
docs.title: Verify

docs.text:
$ laskea verify -h
Usage: laskea verify [OPTIONS] [SOURCE]

  Answer the question if the input document is in good shape.

Arguments:
  [SOURCE]  [default: ]

Options:
  -i, --input <sourcepath>   Path to input file
  -c, --config <configpath>  Path to config file (default is
                             $HOME/.laskea.json)
  -h, --help                 Show this message and exit.
docs.title: Help

docs.text:
$ laskea version
Calculate (Finnish: laskea) some parts. version 2022.2.27+parent.7a230765
docs.title: Version

docs.text: The SBOM in CycloneDX v1.4 JSON format with SHA256 checksum (c2b6d445 ...).
